description:
We are at this location from 08h30 until at least 20h00.  We are runing many volunter projects with some 200 people supporting us each day. 

Do come down if you can.  Pop in to say hello, come and donate a small amount of time to help us tidy up and get ready for the next project, chat about what we are doing and what we get up to.

If you have any questions please do email or call.

[masked]  - o[masked]

Thanks

On Saturday 5 July we have a great street party in the Place de Jeu du Bale, in the Marolles area of Brussels.  Can and help us set-up from 16h00 or join the party from 18h00...
how_to_find_us: We are the only people in this building.
name: Big Volunteer Week
